creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two panels stitched together with red and blue randa; backgorund of beige and tan warp stripes; three large decorative elements made of diamond shapes; yellow, orange, green, purple lined with red; fifteen similarly shaped, smaller decorative elements; three selvedges
title: Cloth (tzute)
